Package dataAccess

Class Auth_DAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.Auth_DAO
public class Auth_DAO extends Object
Is a database for all the user authentication tokens.

  • Method Details

    • addAuth

      public void addAuth(Auth_Record user) throws DataAccessException
      Adds a user to the database
      Parameters:
      user - the users information to be added
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - the error thrown if a user is in the database, or information is invalid

    • removeAuth

      public void removeAuth(String userName) throws DataAccessException
      Removes a user from the database
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the user to be removed
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - the error thrown if a user is in the database, or information is invalid

    • clearAllAuth

      public void clearAllAuth()
      Completely removes all Auth tokens
